author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Launch Trailer for Haste, a fast-paced parkour action speed-running game developed by Landfall. Players will race through an array of worlds, master the movement system, and use items and abilities to progress through each level before it falls apart. Experience the narrative of a dying universe with a cast of memorable characters. Haste is available now for PC (Steam).

#Haste #Gaming #IGN
title: Haste - Official Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Iron & Steel DLC Pack Launch Trailer for Undisputed, a boxing action game developed by Steel City Interactive. Players can now access 7 new boxers with the Iron & Steel DLC Pack including the Klitschko brothers Vitali (Dr. Ironfist) and Wladimir (Dr. Steelhammer) alongside 5 other champions to compete with. The Iron & Steel DLC Pack for Undisputed is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Undisputed #IronAndSteelPack #Gaming
title: Undisputed - Official Iron & Steel DLC Pack Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Early in Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you’ll meet Sen no Rikyu, who teaches Naoe the ways of tea ceremony. After his role in the main story is concluded, you can later find him in Kyoto where he is building a new space, and he wants your help to gather Tea Bowls from all across Japan. Here’s how to find every Tea Bowl in Assassin’s Creed Shadows.

00:00 - Intro
00:34 - 1. Intricate Tea Bowl Collection - Izumi Setsu - Sakai
00:57 - 2. Rustic Tea Bowl Collection - Yamashiro - Kyoto
01:18 - 3. Unique Tea Bowl Collection - Omi - Sakamoto
01:41 - 4. Sophisticated Tea Bowl Collection - Omi - Azuchi
02:11 - 5. Simple Tea Bowl Collection - Tamba - Kameyama
02:30 - 6. Elegant Tea Bowl Collection - Wakasa - Obama
02:56 - 7. Tea Bowl Main Mission Reward (The Wise)
03:13 - How to Finish The “Tea Bowls for Rikyu” Side Quest

#AssassinsCreedShadows #TeaBowls #Gaming
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows - How to Find All 7 Tea Bowls

author: IGN
description:
Here's every Atomfall ending! Atomfall is a first-person survival action adventure with a unique lead system that doesn’t prioritize a single or mainline narrative quest structure. This gameplay video shows the difference between all six possible Atomfall endings and how to escape the varied circumstances of each ending. 

Every ending requires specific questlines to be completed without killing or offending each respective quest giver. Check out our full video walkthrough to see how to unlock every Atomfall ending in a single playthrough.

00:00:00 - Dr. Holder - Destroy Oberon with Poisoned Sample One
00:18:35 - Mother Jago - Giver Oberon Growth Stimulant
00:32:58 - Captain Sims - Destroy Oberon
00:46:43 - The Operator - Destroy Oberon
00:59:52 - Dr. Garrow - Get Oberon Sample
01:10:59 - Joyce Tanner - Get sample and destroy Oberon

For even more Atomfall tips and tricks, head to IGN for our full Wiki guide: https://www.ign.com/wikis/atomfall/

#Atomfall #Gaming #IGN
title: All 6 Atomfall Endings

author: IGN
title: View the 6 A Minecraft Movie collectibles available at McDonald’s. Brought to you by @McDonalds

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 3 BlackCell Battle Pass Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone, the latest additions to the Call of Duty franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can gain access to a suite of new content with the Season 3 BlackCell Battle Pass including the infamous "R0-Z3" Animated Operator Skin, the Energy Siphon Mastercraft Weapon, the “Goodest Boy” Finishing Move, Emotes, and more. The Season 3 BlackCell Battle Pass is available now.

#CallOfDuty #Season3BlackCell #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6 - Official Season 3 BlackCell Battle Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Once you unlock Yasuke in Assassin’s Creed Shadows, a number of different sidequests will open up to you, including “A Collection of Crests” that has you collecting house crests all across Japan for Ota Gyuichi. Here’s how to find and collect all 9 Kamon Crests in Assassin’s Creed Shadows.

Check out our interactive map to see every Kamon Crest Location at once
https://www.ign.com/maps/assassins-creed-shadows/japan?filter=12332

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:15 - How To Collect Each Crest
02:03 - 1. Oda Clan Kamon - Fukushima Ruins
02:24 - 2. Bessho Clan Kamon - Miki Castle
03:40 - 3. Hashiba Clan Kamon - Hiraiyama Fort
05:41 - 4. Akechi Clan Kamon - Sakamoto Castle
06:52 - 5. Niwa Clan Kamon - Tsuruga Castle
08:39 - 6. Shibata Clan Kamon - Genbao Fort
10:24 - 7. Tsutsui Clan Kamon - Koriyama Castle
13:00 - 8. Akiyama Clan Kamon - Uda Matsuyama Castle
14:10 - 9. Ikko Ikki Kamon - Negoroji Kunren-ba

For more help with main missions, resource gathering, tips, tricks and more, head to o
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows - How to Find All 9 Kamon Crests

author: IGN
description:
Celebrate April Fool's with this latest War Thunder trailer, revealing a new update introducing infantry to the game. The new feature will be available soon, starting with World War I gameplay tests. War Thunder will now include World War I armored vehicles, aircraft, and infantry, expanding the game's depth and scale. A closed beta test for infantry will begin soon, with more details to come in the future. You can experience infantry in special test battles dedicated to World War I.

#WarThunderInfantry #Gaming #IGN
title: War Thunder - Official The Next Big Thing: Infantry Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Ballistic Test Grounds Overview Launch Trailer for Fortnite, a tactical round-based precision shooter mode within Fortnite developed by Epic Games. The Test Grounds will allow players to test incoming maps, weapons, and more before deploying into the main Fortnite Ballistic mode. The Fortnite Ballistic Test Grounds will launch with two new locations called Hammer Fall and Storm Chaser Cove alongside new weapons & gadgets such as Burst Assault Rifle, Sovereign Sniper, Fire Grenade, and Overdrive. Fortnite Ballistic Test Grounds is available now.

#Fortnite #FortniteBallistic #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Ballistic Test Grounds Overview Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: It's easy to forget that Jack Black has been absolutely bringing his signature brand of infectious energy, absurd charm and rock 'n roll, high kickin' vibes for parts of 4 decades. His resume is over 300 entries long, including music videos, scene stealing cameo appearances and, of course, leading roles. All that to say, it's a body of work that's worth ranking! So, from romantic lead, to plucky side kick, to Kung Fu Panda, here are our picks for the 11 best Jack Black Movies ... (cue pyrotechnics, heavy metal riff and falsetto) ... OF ALL TIIIIIIIIME!!!!
title: Top 11 Best Jack Black Movies

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Story Trailer for Lunar Remastered Collection, a collection of classic anime adventure RPGs developed by Ashibi Co. and Game Arts Co. Players will be able to experience both Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete and Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete with remastered visuals and modern enhancements for players to enjoy. Journey back to the stars and help Alex and Hiro fight the unstoppable forces of evil in Lunar Remastered Collection, launching on April 18 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#LunarRemasteredCollection #Gaming #IGN
title: Lunar Remastered Collection - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing (2003) will be available on Steam on April 8, 2025. Watch the Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing trailer for this truck racing game, featuring Steam achievements and leaderboard support.

Get ready for some brake jamm'in, CB talk'in, convoy roll'in action across America! From Portland Oregon to Miami Florida, you'll be hauling loads and trying to stay one step ahead of the law as you climb into your Big Rig for non-stop driving action. And if that's not enough, you'll also be able to race your modified Rig on one of 5 different tracks for the ultimate driving rush as you crush the competition and set a new track record.

#BigRigsOverTheRoadRacing #Gaming #IGN
title: Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing - Official Steam Release Date Announcement Trailer
